1.content:
Alright, here is the character format that you will use to make your characters.

Name:
Age:
Appearance:
Personality:
Backstory:
Additional Info:

Not much needed for this one as the giant goddess is gonna have all the powers of the universe in her finger tips. I want to see what you make of this. Also once you pick a character a lot, don’t add the option for more slots then.

Always leave the last option for more options.
1.title: Character format

11.content:
Name: Cleopatra "Cleo" Hargraves

Age: 21

Appearance: A fair-skinned woman with neck length black hair and golden eyes. She loves to wear extravagant dresses, usually strapless ones that have a nice cleavage window, and open-toed heels.

Personality: Cleo's is very self absorbed and believes wholly that the world should revolve around her. She's arrogant and selfish due to her upbringing and refuses to be told 'no'. All in all she's very unpleasant to be around.

Backstory: Cleo was born in New York to a wealthy family descendant of nobles. Her parents spoiled her rotten by giving her everything she ever wanted and never told her no. Eventually she grew into a spoiled rotten brat that never worked a day in her life. One day though fate would grant her unbelievable power, and she'd turned into a goddess without compare.

Additional Info: Cleo is Godzilla sized at 400ft tall and rules the world with an iron fist. She's even turned New York into her kingdom. She lords over everyone else and occasionally grants requests to those that catch her interest.
11.title: Cleo Hargraves

choices: Order the people to build a statue of her
To the park for her royal orgy
To a rival city that refuses her power, to destroy them
111.content:
She didn’t know how it happened, but she is surely loving it. Standing over New York in a extravagant golden two-piece swimsuit that is made out of an adjustable gold material, she looks down on all the people who simply do nothing but worship her, and nothing more. Cleo felt a dark smile on her face just as she stomped around the immediate area, with the cities being redesigned and made for her to walk through without any issue. Every footstep she would make would cause the Earth to tremble in her presence. She can be unpleasant, as she likes to cause destruction for her own amusement, and is selfish and arrogant without end, and will not take no for an answer. However, they tolerate her, given the fact she could easily destroy them out of existence if she wanted to.

She was spoiled in every way imaginable when she was growing up. From all the cars, clothes, rich houses, and everything, she had everything she could have wanted, and she didn’t had to do anything for it. Her parents were incredibly wealthy business people, making millions every day, so there was nothing they couldn’t afford.

One day, she suddenly found herself the size of Godzilla and everyone worshipped her, including her parents. She felt it strange at first, but then she got used to her power and ever since she was even more spoiled than ever. She used her power to make the world bow to her every will, and no one could ever stop her at all. She treks through the city and decides to...
111.title: Cleo the Self Absorbed Goddess

choices: Focus on how May got her powers
May in Tokyo, destroying it for their disobedience to her will
May in Osaka, her kingdom where she is right now being pampered
May in another part of the world, preparing to conquer them
May currently in another planet, conquering their species
12.content:
Name: May Katiko
Age: 11
Appearance: (Using Mayl from Megaman as the appearance base here) Fair skin, short maroon hair, and brown eyes. Often wears a blue swimsuit shown here but can change her appearance at will with her powers, including aging up if you feel it’s needed.
Personality: Fun loving, mischievous, destructive, and most of all cruel. This little girl as a goddess will always cause destruction without consequences no matter where she goes. Very self absorbing also to back up.
Backstory: May Katiko was a Japanese American girl who lives in Tokyo who always dream of being one thing, a kaiju herself. She loved watching those monsters and see how they cause destruction, and seeing how she is a bully and popular girl in her school, she figure by being big and powerful, she could have everyone feel below her. Well one day that happened.
Additional info: She stands at 200ft and rules Japan with an iron fist. She even tends to summon other monsters for pets and makes her friends and several others giantesses to bask in the fun of being giant. People want to please her as she can easily go all Godzilla on them.
Pic: https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/mega...
12.title: May the Monster Goddess

1553.title: Something new

155332.content: Let me remind everyone to leave slots for other readers.
155332.title: More than one goddess slot 4

info.brief_description: You are a woman who has the Omni verse like power to do whatever you please as a giantess.
info.description:
Here, the very premise is simple, you are a woman who has the power of an omiversal god and is able to shape the universe in anyway shape or form to what you desire. Wanna make all the women grow big, do so. Want to remake the world with cute little bunnies or what not, you can do that to. Want to make a world of kaijus or kaiju sized women, feel free. The choice is yours.

They are only two rules to this story.

No Male Giants
The goddess is always a Giantess to ensure that she has power over everything. Can shrink others or grow big and can be more than one giantess, but the goddess is always the giantess.

Just an advise if you do younger characters, be careful of any heavy sexual acts on them as I don’t want to get in trouble, other than that, go nuts.

Remember to add to these stories as well.

Girlzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226717-Girlzilla-Giantes...

Life of a Giant Kid/Kidzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226082-Life-of-a-Giant-K...

Tiny Prison: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2225005-The-Tiny-Prison-a...

Gigantic Lolis: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2222635-Gigantic-Lolis-a-...

The Daibijin Interactive: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219621-The-Daibijin-Inte...

Child/Preteen Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219542-ChildPreteen-Gian...

Chantal: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1881854-Chantal-The-Drago...

A Typical Life of a Kaiju Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1845671-ATypical-Life-as-...
